targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  100 *
  (
sum(rate({__name__=~".*_api_requests_total", 
status="success",
application=~"$application"}[1m]))
    /
    sum(rate({__name__=~".*_api_requests_total",application=~"$application"}[1m]))
  ),
  0
)

clamp_min(
  100 *
  (
    sum by (api)(
      rate({__name__=~".*_api_requests_total",
            application=~"$application",
            status="failed",
            api=~"$api"}[1m])
    )
  )
  /
  (
    sum by (api)(
      rate({__name__=~".*_api_requests_total",
            application=~"$application",
            api=~"$api"}[1m])
    )
  ),
  0
)

1000 *
histogram_quantile(
  0.01,
  sum by (le,application,api, status) (
rate({__name__=~".*_api_request_duration_seconds_bucket",application=~"$application",

        api=~"$api"}[1m])
  )
)

floor(sum by (api)(
  increase(
    {__name__=~".*_api_requests_total",
     application=~"$application",
     status="success",
     api=~"$api"}
  [1m])
))

floor(sum by (api)(
  increase(
    {__name__=~".*_api_requests_total",
     application=~"$application",
     status="failed",
     api=~"$api"}
  [1m])
))

panels.title: Summary Request Count by Uri (Elapsed time)

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  100 *
  (
sum(increase({__name__=~".*_api_requests_total", 
status="success",
application=~"$application"}[$__range]))
    /
    sum(increase({__name__=~".*_api_requests_total",
    application=~"$application"}[$__range]))
  ),
  0
)

1000 *
histogram_quantile(
  0.01,
  sum by (le,application,api, status) (
rate({__name__=~".*_api_request_duration_seconds_bucket",application=~"$application",

        api=~"$api"}[$__range])
  )
)

floor(sum by (api)(
  increase(
    {__name__=~".*_api_requests_total",
     application=~"$application",
     status="success",
     api=~"$api"}
  [$__range])
))

floor(sum by (api)(
  increase(
    {__name__=~".*_api_requests_total",
     application=~"$application",
     status="failed",
     api=~"$api"}
  [$__range])
))

1000 *
histogram_quantile(
  0.01,
  sum by (le, api) (
    rate({__name__=~".*_api_request_duration_seconds_bucket",api=~"$api"}[$__range])
  )
)

1000* (sum by(api)  (rate({__name__=~".*_api_request_duration_seconds_sum",api=~"$api"}[$__range]))
/
sum by(api)  (rate({__name__=~".*_api_request_duration_seconds_count",api=~"$api"}[$__range])))
